song.full_title: Die for You by The Weeknd

lyrics: I'm findin' ways to articulate the feeling I'm goin' through

Even though we're going through it

The distance and the time between us

I would die for you

Just know that I would die for you

It'll never change my mind, 'cause baby
I would die for you
